title: Sophia Bush shines in golden yellow long-sleeve dress at TheWrap's Power Women Summit in LA
text:
She's just landed a new gig in an original series for the upcoming Disney+ streaming platform.

So it's no wonder Sophia Bush was in good spirits as she arrived at the TheWrap's Power Women Summit on Thursday night.

The former One Tree Hill and Chicago P.D. actress, 37, put on a stylish show in a golden yellow long-sleeve dress.

Eye-catching: Sophia Bush put on a stylish show in a golden yellow long-sleeve dress with matching leather purse at TheWrap's Power Women Summit on Thursday night

Her outfit fell to just below the knee and she carried a matching leather purse.

She added contrasting pink pointed toe heels and wore her long dark hair styled back from her face.

On Wednesday, it was reported that Bush will have a recurring role on Disney+ series Love, Simon which follows on from the 2018 movie of the same name.

Looking good: The former One Tree Hill and Chicago P.D. actress, 37, added contrasting pink pointed toe heels and wore her long dark hair styled back from her face

Veteran star: Morgan Fairchild, 69, also went for a vibrant look with a long-sleeved colorful patterned top that she wore with black trousers and black flats

Pretty: This Is Us star Chrissy Metz, 39, posed for photos in a full-length black and green floral-themed dress and shiny gold sandals

Entertainer: Later, Metz, who has a band called Chrissy and The Vapors, took the stage to perform a song

On hand for the event, too, was This Is Us star Chrissy Metz.

The 39-year-old posed for photos in a full-length black and green floral-themed dress and shiny gold sandals.

Later, Metz, who has a band called Chrissy and The Vapors, took the stage to perform a song.

Stylish: Tom Hanks' wife Rita Wilson wore a tailored black jacket and trousers with white piping which she paired with silver sandal heels

Famous face: The singer and actress, 62, wore her shoulder-length hair loose and tousled and carried a small black purse on a short gold chain over one shoulder

Things to share: Wilson took the stage to address the audience during the evening event

Tom Hanks' wife Rita Wilson, also a singer and actress, spoke on stage as well during the evening held in Santa Monica, California.

Wilson, 62, wore a tailored black jacket and trousers with white piping.

She had on silver sandal heels and her shoulder-length hair was loose and tousled.

According to trade outlet TheWrap, the summit 'brings together the industry’s most influential women to drive 'Toward 50/50' equity and inclusivity in entertainment and media.

Pals: Wilson posed for photos with songwriter Diane Warren, left, and TheWrap founder Sharon Waxman, center

Power Women: Wilson and Warren also posed with Metz
